name: GreyNoise
description: GreyNoise Intelligence is a cyber security company that collects, labels, and analyzes Internet-wide scan and attack data

options.name: GreyNoise API URL
options.description: The base URL to the GreyNoise API you wish to use. Defaults to "https://api.greynoise.io".

options.name: API Key
options.description: Account API key used to access GreyNoise API.

options.name: Ignore IPs that have not been seen
options.description: If checked, IPs that have not been seen by GreyNoise will not be displayed in the Polarity Overlay window.
